heading: This Afternoon
text: A rising chanc of showers, mainly north.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Windy. Rain tapering to showers south, changing to snow north, mainly over high terrain.

heading: Thursday
text: Windy early. Snow or rain showers decreasing.
temperature: Upper 30s to mid 40s north, mid to upper 40s south

heading: Friday
text: Thickening clouds. Rising chance of showers west to east.
